project_metadata.title: Al-Malqa Restaurant Website Development
project_metadata.role: Senior Creative Front-End Developer & UI/UX Designer
project_metadata.objective: Build a high-performance, SEO-rich, modern multi-page website for 'Al-Malqa', a premium Arabic restaurant brand.
project_metadata.animation_library: Framer Motion (React integration in Astro) or Native CSS Animations
project_metadata.architecture: Multi-page with Astro View Transitions (SPA feel)

visual_language.texture: Subtle noise or 'Carpet Motif' pattern at 5% opacity in background
visual_language.vibe: Warm, 'Majlis' style gathering, authentic, modern nostalgia

seo_requirements: JSON-LD 'Restaurant' Schema injection (hours, address, price range)
performance: Lazy load images below the fold
technical_specifications.navigation: Single-scroll feel using Astro View Transitions for morphing between routes

key_features.description: Visually striking split or centered layout.
Two high-quality images of signature dishes in the center. MUST have a continuous, mild 'floating/jump' animation (sine wave easing). Weightless feel.
Headline: 'A Place of Gathering'. Primary CTA: 'Order Now' button.

design_rules: No standard lists. Use curved-edge rectangles (border-radius: 20px).
Main Courses: Occupy larger grid cells (col-span-2 or row-span-2).
Visual Ratio: Big to Small mosaic effect.
Content: Placeholder food images with overlaid name and price.

content_structure: Asymmetric layout with 3-4 images scattered alongside text.
Vibe: Nostalgic and rooted in Qatarâ€™s heritage.

deliverables: Component code for: HeroAnimation, BentoMenuGrid, StoryLayout, OrderLinks
Page code for: index.astro, menu.astro, story.astro, order.astro
